keyTakeAways: A bomb exploded outside the home of Sigfrido Ranucci, a top Italian investigative journalist, damaging two cars and a nearby house.
The device was likely made from firework explosives and planted at the front gate of his home in Campo Ascolano, about 19 miles south of Rome.
Ranucci, host of RAI’s 'Report' program, has been under police protection for years and has received multiple threats, including threats involving bullets.
No injuries were reported, though Ranucci expressed shock at the attack.
The Italian government, including Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni, condemned the act as intimidation against freedom of the press.
Anti-Mafia prosecutors opened an investigation into the incident, citing possible mafia-style methods.
Ranucci’s program 'Report' has frequently clashed with the government, leading to legal actions by several members of Prime Minister Meloni’s rightist coalition.
Interior Minister Matteo Piantedosi announced increased police protection for Ranucci.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A bomb exploded outside the home of Sigfrido Ranucci, host of Italy’s flagship investigative program 'Report,' damaging two cars and a nearby house in Campo Ascolano, 19 miles south of Rome. Ranucci, who has long faced threats and has been under police protection, reported that the explosion occurred about 20 minutes after returning home. Though no injuries were sustained, the attack has prompted widespread condemnation, including from Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni, who stressed the importance of press freedom. Anti-Mafia prosecutors have opened an investigation into the incident, suspecting mafia-style methods. The attack comes amid ongoing political conflict between the government and 'Report,' as several members of Prime Minister Meloni’s coalition—including Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti, Industry Minister Adolfo Urso, and members of the Brothers of Italy party—have sued the program over its critical reporting. The event underscores growing tensions between political power and media independence in Italy.
title: Bomb explodes outside home of top Italian investigative journalist
